thread.title: Three million seats of AirAsia up for graps
thread.title_full: Three million seats of AirAsia up for graps

title: Three million seats of AirAsia up for graps
text:
Home » travel » Three million seats of AirAsia up for graps GETAWAYS Three million seats of AirAsia up for graps THE NATION October 19, 2015 6:56 pm 
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam AirAsia offers special fares to all destinations across Asia and Australia from 19 October to 1 November. AirAsia, the world's best low cost airline for seven consecutive years is offering 3 million promotional seats to over 20 countries across Asia and Australia, targeted to drive domestic and international travel within the extensive regional networks for both AirAsia and AirAsia X airline groups. For domestic travel within Thailand, guests can fly to Chiang Mai , Chiang Rai, Nan, Buri Ram, Khon Kaen, Sakon Nakhon, Udon Thani, Roi Et, Phuket, Nakhon Si Thammarat, Ubon Ratchathani, Krabi, Surat Thani with all-in-fares from as low as Bt490* one-way; all departing from Bangkok (Don Mueang). Guests can also fly further from Bangkok (Don Mueang) to destinations such as Yangon, Mandalay, Siem Reap, Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, Phnom Penh, Macau, Hong Kong, Guangzhou, Chongqing, Changsha, Shenzhen, Kunming, Wuhan, Singapore, Bali and Penang starting from 990THB one-way, all inclusive of airport tax. Booking for these promotional seats can be made from 19 October to 1 November 2015 with the traveling period from 19 October 2015 until 29 February 2016 at airasia.com, AirAsia's mobile app on iPhone and Android devices, as well as the mobile site mobile.airasia.com. For a 24-hour head start, AirAsia BIG members and BIG Prepaid Mastercard cardmembers can enjoy priority flight redemption and priority booking for the promo seats on airasiabig.com and airasia.com respectively, while bargain hunters can also save up to 40% and more when they book their hotel with promo seats on AirAsiaGo.com. These priority accesses will commence 24 hours earlier on 0001hrs of 18 October 2015 for the same travelling period stated above. Tassapon Bijleveled, Chief Executive Officer of Thai AirAsia said, "As the pioneer for low cost travel and one of the largest airline groups in the region, AirAsia and AirAsia X groups are proud to offer 3 million amazing promotional seats to all of our guests, making traveling to a dream destination more accessible and affordable for all." The airline group also encourages all guests to pre-book sufficient baggage allowance online and save up to 88% at the point of flight tickets booking; or alternatively guest can also pre-book or add more baggage allocation at airasia.com up to 4 hours before the scheduled time of departure using the 'Manage My Booking' function. Keep updated with AirAsia's latest promotions and activities via Twitter (twitter.com/AirAsiaThailand) and Facebook (facebook.com/AirAsiaThailand). 41 Viewed
